com.orchestranetworks.service
Interface AccessRule

All Known Implementing Classes:
AccessRule.NoWriteRule
public interface AccessRule

Specifies a programmatic access rule.

Access rules are set by the methods setAccessRule... in the class SchemaExtensionsContext.

See Also:
SchemaExtensionsContext.setAccessRuleOnNode(Path, AccessRule)

Nested Class Summary
static class AccessRule.NoWriteRule
          Wraps another rule to return a maximum access level of read-only.

          Always returns hidden access permission.

          Always returns read-only access permission.

          Always returns read-write access permission.
 
Method Summary

Field Detail

public static final AccessRule ALWAYS_READ_ONLY

ALWAYS_HIDDEN

public static final AccessRule ALWAYS_HIDDEN
Always returns hidden access permission.

Method Detail

getPermission

public AccessPermission getPermission(Adaptation aDataSetOrRecord,
                                      Session aSession,
                                      SchemaNode aNode)
Returns a permission for the specified arguments.

Warning: if this AccessRule is assigned to a table record, this method is called in three contexts:

  • For evaluating table "column" permissions; in this case, aDataSetOrRecord is the current data set.
  • For evaluating the node permissions of a specific existing record; in this case, aDataSetOrRecord is the current record.
  • For evaluating the node permissions in a record creation context (meaning that the record does not exist yet); in this case, aDataSetOrRecord is the current instance.

Parameters:
aDataSetOrRecord - current data set or record (see warning above)
aSession - current user session
aNode - current data model node whose access must be computed; when the permission is requested for the global data set, this is the root node
Returns:
a permission, never null.
See Also:
SchemaExtensionsContext, Performance guidelines
